```{r downloading GDP data, include=FALSE}
national_account_html_elements <- 
  read_html("https://www.armstat.am/am/?nid=202") |> 
  html_elements("a")

national_account_urls <- 
  tibble(
    url = html_attr(national_account_html_elements, "href"),
    text = html_text(national_account_html_elements)
  ) |> 
  filter(grepl("^\\.\\./", url)) |> 
  mutate(
    text = str_trim(text),
    url = str_replace(url, "^\\.\\.", "https://www.armstat.am")
    ) |> 
  filter(text != "")

GDP_services_links <- 
  national_account_urls |> 
  filter(grepl("^ีีิฑ", text)) |> 
  pull(url)

# Quarterly GDP download

system(
  paste0("curl -A 'Mozilla/5.0' \"", GDP_services_links[4],
         "\" -o \"GDP_quarter.xls\"")
)

GDP_quarter  <-
  left_join(
    
    read_excel("GDP_quarter.xls", skip = 4) |> 
      rename(code = 1, arm = 2, eng = 3, rus = 4) |> 
      pivot_longer(matches("\\d{4}"), names_to = "date", values_to = "production"),
    
    read_excel("GDP_quarter.xls", skip = 4, sheet = 4) |> 
      rename(code = 1, arm = 2, eng = 3, rus = 4) |> 
      pivot_longer(matches("\\d{4}"), names_to = "date", values_to = "vol_YoY_pct"),
    
    by = join_by(code, arm, eng, rus, date)
  )

GDP_quarter |> write_excel_csv("GDP_quarter_tidy.csv")

# Annual GDP download

system(
  paste0("curl -A 'Mozilla/5.0' \"", GDP_services_links[1],
         "\" -o \"GDP_annual.xls\"")
)

GDP_annual  <-
  left_join(
    
    read_excel("GDP_annual.xls", skip = 4) |> 
      rename(code = 1, arm = 2, eng = 3, rus = 4) |> 
      pivot_longer(matches("\\d{4}"), names_to = "year", values_to = "production"),
    
    read_excel("GDP_annual.xls", skip = 4, sheet = 4) |> 
      rename(code = 1, arm = 2, eng = 3, rus = 4) |> 
      pivot_longer(matches("\\d{4}"), names_to = "year", values_to = "vol_YoY_pct"),
    
    by = join_by(code, arm, eng, rus, year)
  ) |> 
  mutate(year = as.integer(year))

GDP_annual |> write_excel_csv("GDP_annual_tidy.csv")
```

```{r}
plot_1_gdp_annual_growth <- 
  GDP_annual |> 
  filter(
    eng == "Domestic product (gross, market prices)",
    !is.na(vol_YoY_pct)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    mean_groth = exp(mean(log(vol_YoY_pct), na.rm = TRUE)),
    across(c(mean_groth, vol_YoY_pct), ~.x/100 - 1),
    pct_text = percent(vol_YoY_pct, accuracy = 0.1)
  ) |> 
  ggplot(aes(year, vol_YoY_pct, label = pct_text)) +
  geom_col(fill = new_palette_colors[2], alpha = 1) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = mean_groth), color = new_palette_colors[2], alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = 0), color = new_palette_colors[1]) +
  geom_text(aes(
    vjust = ifelse(vol_YoY_pct >= 0.03, 1.5, -0.5),
    color = ifelse(abs(vol_YoY_pct) <= 0.03, "white", "blue"),
  )) +
  geom_text(
    data = tibble(x = 2014, y = 0.048, label = "4.5% ีดีซีปีซีถ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณ"),
    aes(x, y, label = label), # color = new_palette_colors[1]
  ) +

  scale_color_manual(values = c("white", new_palette_colors[2])) +
```

```{r, include=FALSE}

main_GDP_plot_data <- 
  GDP_quarter  |> 
  filter(!is.na(code)) |> 
  left_join(armenian_short_names, by = "code") |> 
  mutate(
    date = yq(date) + months(3) - days(1),
    year = year(date),
    eng = arm_short,
    eng = str_trunc(eng, 20),
    eng = paste0(code, ". ", eng),
    eng = fct_lump(eng, n = 7, w = production)
  ) |> 
  filter(year >= 2017) |> 
  group_by(date, year, eng) |> 
  summarise(production = sum(production), .groups = "drop") |> 
  mutate(code = str_replace_all(eng, "([A-Z])\\..*", "\\1")) |> 
  group_by(eng) |> 
  mutate(production_yoy = roll_sumr(production, 4)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  group_by(date) |>
  na.omit() |>
  mutate(
    pct = production_yoy/ sum(production_yoy),
  ) |> 
  ungroup() |>
  group_by(year) |> 
  mutate(
    pct_text = ifelse(
      eng != "Other" & date == max(date), # & year %in% c(2013, 2023), 
      paste0(
        number(production_yoy/1e6, accuracy = 0.01), "ึ (",
        percent(pct, accuracy = 0.1), ")", "โ"
        ),
      NA
    )
  ) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate(
    pct_text = case_when(
      date == max(date) & eng != "Other" ~ paste0("โ", eng,  " ", pct_text),
      date == min(date) & eng != "Other" ~ paste0(pct_text, code, "โ"),
      TRUE ~ pct_text
    ),
    production_yoy = production_yoy / 1e6
  )

factoring_levels <- 
  main_GDP_plot_data |> 
  filter(date == max(date)) |> 
  mutate(
    eng = fct_reorder(eng, production_yoy),
    eng = fct_relevel(eng, "Other", after = 0),
    eng = fct_rev(eng)
  ) |> 
  count(eng) |> 
  pull(eng)

main_GDP_plot_data <- 
  main_GDP_plot_data %>%
  mutate(eng = factor(eng, levels = factoring_levels))
         

segments <- 
  main_GDP_plot_data |> 
  # filter(year %in% c(2013, 2017, 2020, 2023)) |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  filter(date == max(date)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  group_by(date) |> 
  summarise(
    production_yoy = sum(production_yoy),
    production_yoy_text = number(production_yoy, accuracy = 0.01),
    production_yoy = production_yoy + 1
  ) |>  
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate(
    production_yoy_text = ifelse(
      date == max(date), 
      paste0(production_yoy_text, "*"), 
      production_yoy_text
    ),
  )
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
main_codes <-

  slice_head(n = 12) |>

plot_3_gdp_growth <-
  GDP_annual |> 
  filter(
    year >= 2018,
    code %in% main_codes | grepl("ีีฅึึีซีถ", arm)
  ) |> 
  mutate(vol_YoY_pct = vol_YoY_pct / 100) |> 
  group_by(code, arm) |> 
  summarise(vol_pct = prod(vol_YoY_pct) - 1, .groups = "drop") |> 
  mutate(
    arm = case_when(
      grepl("ีีฅึึีซีถ", arm) ~ "ีีกีดีกีญีกีผีถ ีถีฅึึีซีถ ีกึีคีตีธึีถึ", 
      grepl("ีกีผึีฟีธึึ", arm) ~ "ีีฅีฎีกีฎีกีญ ึ ีดีกีถึีกีฎีกีญ ีกีผึีฟีธึึ",
      grepl("ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีด ึ ีบีกีทีฟ", arm) ~ "ีีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีด ึ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถ",
      TRUE ~ arm
    ),
    text = ifelse(is.na(code), arm, paste0(code, ". ", arm)),
    # text = str_trunc(text, 30),
    text = fct_rev(text),
    text = fct_relevel(text, "ีีกีดีกีญีกีผีถ ีถีฅึึีซีถ ีกึีคีตีธึีถึ", after = Inf),
    text_x_possition = case_when(
      vol_pct < 0 ~ 0,
      vol_pct < 0.12 ~ vol_pct + 0.12,
      TRUE ~ vol_pct
    ),
    label_text = percent(vol_pct, accuracy = 0.1),
    fill = ifelse(is.na(code), "GDP", "rest")
  ) |> 
  ggplot(aes(vol_pct, text, fill = fill)) +

    color = ifelse(abs(vol_pct) <= 0.12, "blue", "white")

  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = new_palette_colors[1]) +
```

```{r gdp components calculation, include=FALSE}

GDP_quarter_old <- read_csv("../2024_08_26_GDP_components/GDP_quarter_tidy_as_of_2024Q1.csv") |> 
  mutate(source = "old")

GDP_quarter_new <- GDP_quarter |> 
  mutate(source = "revised") |> 
  bind_rows(GDP_quarter_old)


GDP_quarter_pct <- 
  GDP_quarter_new |> 
  filter(grepl("Domestic product", eng)) |> 
  transmute(date, source, GDP_growth = vol_YoY_pct/100 - 1) |> 
  na.omit()

GDP_quarter_contribution <- 
  GDP_quarter_new |> 
  left_join(GDP_quarter_pct, by = c("date", "source")) |>
  group_by(eng, source) |> 
  mutate(
    vol_YoY_pct = vol_YoY_pct/100,
    contribution = lag(production) * (vol_YoY_pct - 1),
    contribution = ifelse(grepl("gross,", eng), NA, contribution)
  ) |> 
  group_by(date, source) |> 
  mutate(
    contribution = contribution / sum(contribution, na.rm = TRUE) * GDP_growth,
    contribution = ifelse(grepl("Domestic product", eng), vol_YoY_pct - 1, contribution)
  ) |> 
  select(-GDP_growth)

groupping_contributions <- function(select_date, groupped_codes_ = c("H","I","L","M","N","P","Q","S","T")){
  
  if (!is.null(select_date)) {
    GDP_quarter_contribution <- 
      GDP_quarter_contribution |> 
      filter(date %in%  select_date)
  }
  
  tbl_groupped <- 
    GDP_quarter_contribution |> 
    left_join(armenian_short_names, by = "code") |> 
    # filter(date == "2024-Q2") |>
    ungroup() |> 
    filter(!is.na(contribution)) |> 
    mutate(
      groupped_codes = case_when(
        code %in% c("D", "E") ~ "D+E",
        code %in% groupped_codes_ ~ "ิฑีตีฌ\nีฎีกีผีก-ีถีฅึ",  # R ีฐีกีถีฅีฌ
        grepl("Taxes on products", eng) ~ "TA",
        grepl("Financial Intermediate", eng) ~ "FISIM",
        grepl("Domestic product", eng) ~ "ีีิฑ\nีกีณ",
        TRUE ~ code
      ),
      groupped_arm = case_when(
        code %in% c("D", "E") ~ "ิทีถีฅึีฃีซีก ึ ีปึีกีดีกีฟีกีฏีกึีกึีธึีด",
        code %in% groupped_codes_ ~ paste(groupped_codes_, collapse = "+"),
        grepl("Domestic product", eng) ~ NA,
        code %in% LETTERS ~ arm_short,
        TRUE ~ arm
      ),
      groupped_arm = str_remove(groupped_arm, ". ีบีกึีฟีกีคีซึ ีฝีธึีซีกีฌีกีฏีกีถ ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีกีฃึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ"),
      groupped_arm = str_remove(groupped_arm, " .ีีิฑีิพ."),
      groupped_arm = str_remove(groupped_arm, ". ีกีพีฟีธีดีฅึีฅีถีกีถีฅึีซ ึ ีดีธีฟีธึีซีฏีฌีถีฅึีซ ีถีธึีธีฃีธึีด"),
      groupped_arm = str_remove(groupped_arm, ". ีกีถีฟีกีผีกีตีซีถ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ึ ีฑีฏีถีธึีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถ"),
      groupped_arm = str_remove(groupped_arm, " .ีฐีกีถีกีฎ ีฝีธึีขีฝีซีคีซีกีถีฅึ."),
    ) |> 
    group_by(groupped_codes, date, source, groupped_arm) |> 
    summarise(
      contribution = sum(contribution),
      .groups = "drop"
    ) |> 
    group_by(date, source) |> 
    arrange(date, source) |> 
    mutate(
      labels = percent(contribution, accuracy = 0.1),
      groupped_codes = fct_reorder(groupped_codes, contribution),
      groupped_codes = fct_relevel(
        groupped_codes, "TA", "FISIM", "ีีิฑ\nีกีณ", after = Inf
      ),
      id = as.numeric(groupped_codes)
    ) |> 
    arrange(id) |> 
    mutate(
      annotation = paste(groupped_codes, groupped_arm, sep = " โ "),
      annotation = str_replace(annotation, "\n", " "),
      annotation = ifelse(grepl("ีีิฑ", annotation), " ", annotation),
      annotation = ifelse(grepl("FISIM", annotation), " ", annotation),
      annotation = fct_reorder(annotation, id),
      end = cumsum(contribution),
      start = end - contribution,
      end = ifelse(groupped_codes == "ีีิฑ\nีกีณ", 0, end),
      start = ifelse(groupped_codes == "ีีิฑ\nีกีณ", contribution, start),
      fill_ = case_when(
        groupped_codes == "ีีิฑ\nีกีณ" ~ "ิธีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ",
        contribution < 0 ~ "ิฒีกึีกีฝีกีฏีกีถ",
        TRUE ~ "ิดึีกีฏีกีถ"
      )
    ) |> 
    ungroup()
  
  return(tbl_groupped)
}
```

## [๐จ๐๐ต ีีธีฒีกึีฏีพีกีฎ ีกีถีฏีธึีด. ิปีถีนีธีีพ ีง ีกีบึีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ](https://www.tvyal.com/newsletter/2024/2024_09_30)

### **ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีซ ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีธึีถ**

ีีฅึีปีซีถ ีฟีกึีซีถีฅึีซีถ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึีธึึีกีขีฅึีฅีฌ ีง ีฟีบีกีพีธึีซีน ีกีณี 2022 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีฐีกีฝีถีฅีฌีธีพ 12.6%-ีซ: ีีกีฏีกีตีถ ีกีตีฝ ีฉีพีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีธึีด ีฉีกึีถีพีกีฎ ีฅีถ ีดีซ ีทีกึึ ีดีฟีกีฐีธีฃีซีน ีดีซีฟีธึีดีถีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีฏีกีฝีฏีกีฎีซ ีฟีกีฏ ีฅีถ ีคีถีธึีด ีกีตีฝ ีกีณีซ ีฏีกีตีธึีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึ ีฅึีฏีกึีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีฐีฅีผีกีถีฏีกึีถีฅึีจ:

### ีีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีซ ีบีกีฟึีกีถึีจ

ิณีฎีกีบีกีฟีฏีฅึ 1.

[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tavad/tvyal_newsletter/refs/heads/main/2024/2024_09_30_GDP/plots/plot_1_gdp_annual_growth.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tavad/tvyal_newsletter/refs/heads/main/2024/2024_09_30_GDP/plots/plot_1_gdp_annual_growth.png)

ิฑีผีกีปีซีถ ีฃีฎีกีบีกีฟีฏีฅึีจ ึีธึีตึ ีง ีฟีกีฌีซีฝ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีซ ีคีซีถีกีดีซีฏีกีถ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีฟีกึีซีถีฅึีซีถ: ินีฅึ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีฟีกึีซีถีฅึีซีถ ีกีณีซ ีฟีฅีดีบีฅึีจ ีฟีบีกีพีธึีซีน ีฅีถ ีฅีฒีฅีฌ, ีฏีกึึีธึ ีง ีถีทีฅีฌ, ีธึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฅึีฏีกึีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีดีซีปีซีถ ีกีณีจ ีฏีกีฆีดีธึีด ีง 4.5%: ีีกีถีฏีกึีกีฎ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃ ีฑีฃีฟีธึีด ีง ีพีฅึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌ ีซึ ีดีซีปีซีถ ีกึีชีฅึีซีถ, ีฅีฉีฅ ีนีฏีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกึีกึ ีธึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ: ีึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีฅีฌ ีกึีฟีกีคึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีธึีดีจ, ีธึีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีฅึีกีทีญีกีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฅึีฏีกึีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีฏีกีตีธึีถ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีกึีชีฅึีซ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีธึีด: ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีจ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีด ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีพีธึีด ีง ีกึีฟีกึีซีถ ีดีซีฟีธึีดีถีฅึีธีพ, ีธึีธีถึ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีด ีธึีถีฅีถ ีฏีกึีณีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีขีถีธึีตีฉ:

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ 2025 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีฅีฌ ีง 5.6% ีกีณีซ ีฉีซึีกีญ, ีซีถีนีจ ีฆีฃีกีฌีซีธึีฅีถ ึีกีฎึ ีง ีถีกีญีฏีซีถีธึีด ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีพีกีฎ 7% ีฅึีฏีกึีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีซึ: ีีกีฏีกีตีถ ีถีธึีตีถีซีฝีฏ ีกีตีฝ 5.6% ีฉีซึีกีญีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีนีกึีกีฆีกีถึ ีฌีกีพีกีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีฌีซีถีฅีฌี ีฐีกีทีพีซ ีกีผีถีฅีฌีธีพ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีกีผีธึึีพีกีฎึีกีตีซีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีจ (ิฟีกึีคีกึีฅึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซีถี [๐ฟ๐คจ๐ ินีกีถีฏีกึีชีฅึ ีงึีฅีฏีฟโค 2024 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีซ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีถีฅึีจ](https://www.tvyal.com/newsletter/2024/2024_03_29))ึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีีิฑ-ีซ ีธีฒีปีกีดีซีฟ ีดีซีปีซีถ-ีฅึีฏีกึีกีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟ ีกีณีซ ีถีฅึีธึีชีจ ีดีซีปีซีถีธึีด ีฃีถีกีฐีกีฟีพีธึีด ีง ีดีธีฟ 4.5 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝ: ีีฅีถึ ีกีตีฝ ีฉีพีซีถ ีฏีฑีฃีฟีซ ีดีฅึ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีฅีฉีฅ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีจ ีธึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีนีฅีถีฉีกึีฏีพีซ:

### ิฑีณีซ ีทีกึีชีซีน ีธึีชีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีธึีถ

ิณีฎีกีบีกีฟีฏีฅึ 2.

[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tavad/tvyal_newsletter/refs/heads/main/2024/2024_09_30_GDP/plots/plot_2_gdp_main.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tavad/tvyal_newsletter/refs/heads/main/2024/2024_09_30_GDP/plots/plot_2_gdp_main.png)

ิตึีฏึีธึีค ีฃีฎีกีบีกีฟีฏีฅึีถ ีกึีฟีกึีธีฌีธึีด ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีีิฑ-ีซ ีฏีกีผีธึึีพีกีฎึีจ ีจีฝีฟ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีณีตีธึีฒีฅึีซ: ิฑีฏีถีฐีกีตีฟ ีง, ีธึ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีฟีกึีซีถีฅึีซีถ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีง ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ีฆีฃีกีฌีซ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถี ีฃีตีธึีฒีกีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅึีซ ีถีพีกีฆีดีกีดีข ึ ีฎีกีผีกีตีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซ ีกีณีธีพ: 2018 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีฃีตีธึีฒีกีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีฟีฅีฒีธึีด ีงึี ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีฅีฌีธีพ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ 16.4 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีจ, ีซีฝีฏ ีกีตีฝ ีบีกีฐีซีถ ีกีตีถ ีซีปีฅีฌ ีง 4-ึีค ีฐีธึีซีฆีธีถีกีฏีกีถี ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีฅีฌีธีพ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีจีถีคีกีดีฅีถีจ 9.0 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีจ:

## English Summary

### ๐จ๐๐ต Hidden Decline: What's Driving Armenia's Economy?

**Analysis of Armenia's Economic Growth**

Armenia's economy has shown impressive growth in recent years, reaching 12.6% in 2022. However, this growth masks several concerning trends that call into question its sustainability and long-term prospects. The analysis reveals that much of this growth is driven by external factors and temporary phenomena, rather than sustainable, long-term economic drivers.

The study highlights the significant role of capital inflow from Russia, large-scale gold re-exports, and growth in services sectors like IT and finance. However, these factors are largely short-term and dependent on external conditions. Meanwhile, traditional sectors like agriculture have seen a decline. The article warns that without substantial structural changes, maintaining high growth rates will be challenging. It also points out potential fiscal risks, including tax collection shortfalls and the possibility of increasing public debt. The author suggests that Armenia's reasonable medium to long-term GDP growth potential is around 4.5%, significantly lower than the government's targets, and calls for more sustainable economic strategies.
